entries.name: command(command, cls = self)
entries.desc: The plugins should declare that they handle a command through this helper.

entries.name: source(source, cls = self)
entries.desc: The plugins should declare that they provide a installation source through this helper.

entries.name: cache_dir()
entries.desc: The cache dir to be used by the plugins for storage

entries.name: tmp(*names)
entries.desc: A tmp dir to be used by plugins Accepts names that get concatenated as suffix
